item.title: Where To Watch Presence: Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.description: Steven Soderbergh's Presence is one of the most unique horror movies of the year, and here where you can watch it in theaters and on digital.

item.title: Sonic 4 Development Gets Definitive Progress Update From Franchise Director: "The Goal Above Everything"
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Director Jeff Fowler discusses the progress of Sonic the Hedgehog 4, teasing a new adventure to come for the Blue Blur's friends and foes.
